Shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
Shipping.subtitle: We strive to deliver your Flora treasures as quickly and safely as possible. Here is everything you need to know about our shipping process in Tunisia.
Shipping.flatRateDesc: We offer a flat shipping rate for all orders.
Shipping.fastDeliveryDesc: Greater Tunis: 24-48h. Other regions (Sousse, Sfax, Gabes, etc.): 2-4 business days.
Shipping.codDesc: Paiement √† la livraison. Pay conveniently in cash when your package arrives door-to-door.
Shipping.coverageDesc: We deliver to all 24 governorates of Tunisia, from Bizerte to Tataouine.
Shipping.processDesc: We follow a streamlined process to ensure your order reach you in perfect condition.
Shipping.step1Desc: Once you place your order, we'll send you a confirmation message. Our team might call you to verify the delivery address.
Shipping.step2Desc: Our team carefully picks and packs your accessories in our signature protective packaging within 1 business day.
Shipping.step3Desc: Your package is handed over to our trusted delivery partners for the journey.
Shipping.step4Desc: The courier will contact you via phone before arrival to ensure you're available to receive your Flora treasure.
Shipping.q1: Can I open the package before paying?
Shipping.a1: Of course! At Flora, we want you to be 100% happy. You can check your items in front of the courier before finalizing the payment.
Shipping.q2: Do you ship to remote areas?
Shipping.a2: Yes, we reach everywhere in Tunisia! Whether you're in Djerba, Nefta, or Tabarka, we'll get your treasure to you.
Shipping.trustDesc: Every shipment is handled with the utmost care. We use premium floral-inspired packaging to ensure your accessories arrive in pristine condition, ready to sparkle.

FAQ.title: How can we help you?
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about the Flora experience.

questions.orderPlacementQ: How do I place an order?
questions.orderPlacementA: Simply browse our collection, add your favorite treasures to the cart, and proceed to checkout. You don't need an account to shop with us!
questions.durabilityA: Yes! We carefully select our materials to ensure they sparkle for a long time. However, like all jewelry, we recommend keeping them away from water and perfume to maintain their shine.
questions.stockQ: What if an item I want is out of stock?
questions.stockA: Our treasures go fast! You can follow us on Instagram @flora_.access for restock announcements or contact us to inquire about a specific item.
questions.shippingCostA: We offer a flat rate of 7.00 DT for deliveries all across Tunisia.
questions.deliveryTimeQ: How long will it take to get my order?
questions.deliveryTimeA: For Greater Tunis, it usually takes 24-48 hours. For other regions, expect your delivery within 2-4 business days.
questions.openPackageQ: Can I open the package before paying?
questions.openPackageA: Absolutely! We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase. You can inspect your items in front of the courier before finalizing the Cash on Delivery payment.
questions.paymentMethodsA: Currently, we offer 'Cash on Delivery' (Paiement √† la livraison). You pay the courier in cash when your package arrives at your doorstep.
questions.bankTransferA: At the moment, we prioritize cash on delivery for its simplicity and security for our customers. Contact us if you have special requirements.

FAQ.footerSubtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is always ready to help you find your perfect match.
